trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Rancho Palos Verdes
There were no other sightings in Rancho Palos Verdes on or around June 16th 2009
Summary: I saw a bright star moving back and forth through the night sky at a ridiculosly fast pace. Way too fast for any object we have on earth. I just know it was a UFO.
divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my friend sonny were out side one night smokeing a ciggerette. It was about 10ish. clear night sky. we were looking up at the stars naming the big dipper and what not. And that was when this one paticular star-like thing that caught my attention. it would move to one side of the sky and then bam! it was on the other side. it just moved so fast. me and sonny were trying think of what it was. Fisrt we thought it was a plane or jet. but those dont move in zig zags going super freakian fast. Thats when we decided that it defintly was a a ufo. I called my family and told them to look up too. They all saw it. And they all aggree.
